page.title: 18CHANGES IN CARMARTHEN
page.content: I asked my gran some questions about Carmarthen to see how it has changed in the past 50 years.She said that Carmarthen has changed in a number of ways.For example,there are many more shops than there used to be. There used to be more public houses 50 years ago but she thinks there are more ruffians about now. She said that the town centre has changed because a lot of buildings have been knocked down. She thought that it was a busier town 50 years ago because more farmers came in and more people seemed to come to things like the Horse Fair in Lammas Street. When I asked her if Carmarthen had a mayor 50 years ago she said it did.I think that my gran believes that Carmarthen is a better place to live in now. By Sarah Powell.
